from event_manager import *
from aiot_lcd1602 import LCD1602
from machine import RTC
import time
from yolobit import *
button_a.on_pressed = None
button_b.on_pressed = None
button_a.on_pressed_ab = button_b.on_pressed_ab = -1
from mqtt import *
import ntptime
from aiot_rgbled import RGBLed
from aiot_ir_receiver import *
import music
from machine import Pin, SoftI2C
from aiot_dht20 import DHT20

event_manager.reset()

aiot_lcd1602 = LCD1602()

def on_event_timer_callback_U_t_E_r_i():
  global th_C3_B4ng_tin, RT, PASS, STATUS, RH, ADMIN, LUX, AUTO_Q, AUTO_L
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(0, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(('%0*d' % (2, RTC().datetime()[2])))
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(2, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('/')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(3, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(('%0*d' % (2, RTC().datetime()[1])))
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(5, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('/')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(6, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(('%0*d' % (2, RTC().datetime()[0])))
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(10, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(' ')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(11, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(('%0*d' % (2, RTC().datetime()[4])))
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(14, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(('%0*d' % (2, RTC().datetime()[5])))

event_manager.add_timer_event(60000, on_event_timer_callback_U_t_E_r_i)

def on_event_timer_callback_Y_X_n_U_C():
  global th_C3_B4ng_tin, RT, PASS, STATUS, RH, ADMIN, LUX, AUTO_Q, AUTO_L
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(13, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(':')
  time.sleep_ms(1000)
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(13, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(' ')
  time.sleep_ms(1000)

event_manager.add_timer_event(2000, on_event_timer_callback_Y_X_n_U_C)

tiny_rgb = RGBLed(pin0.pin, 4)

aiot_ir_rx = IR_RX(Pin(pin1.pin, Pin.IN)); aiot_ir_rx.start();

# Mô tả hàm này...
def Ki_E1_BB_83m_Tra_M_E1_BA_ADt_M_C3_A3():
  global th_C3_B4ng_tin, RT, PASS, STATUS, RH, ADMIN, LUX, AUTO_Q, AUTO_L, aiot_lcd1602, aiot_dht20, aiot_ir_rx, tiny_rgb
  if aiot_ir_rx.get_code() == IR_REMOTE_1:
    music.play(['A3:1'], wait=True)
    PASS = str(PASS) + '1'
  if aiot_ir_rx.get_code() == IR_REMOTE_2:
    music.play(['B3:1'], wait=True)
    PASS = str(PASS) + '2'
  if aiot_ir_rx.get_code() == IR_REMOTE_3:
    music.play(['C3:1'], wait=True)
    PASS = str(PASS) + '3'
  if aiot_ir_rx.get_code() == IR_REMOTE_F:
    music.play(['F3:1'], wait=True)
    if PASS == str(ADMIN) + str(ADMIN):
      ADMIN = ''
      STATUS = 1
      PASS = ''
    else:
      if PASS == ADMIN:
        display.show(Image.YES)
        pin4.servo_write(90)
        time.sleep_ms(2000)
        pin4.servo_write(0)
      else:
        display.show(Image.NO)
        pin4.servo_write(0)
      PASS = ''
      time.sleep_ms(2000)
      display.clear()
  aiot_ir_rx.clear_code()

def on_event_timer_callback_a_g_V_A_t():
  global th_C3_B4ng_tin, RT, PASS, STATUS, RH, ADMIN, LUX, AUTO_Q, AUTO_L
  if pin3.read_digital()==1:
    display.set_all('#ff0000')
  else:
    display.set_all('#000000')

event_manager.add_timer_event(100, on_event_timer_callback_a_g_V_A_t)

def on_event_timer_callback_N_L_a_a_h():
  global th_C3_B4ng_tin, RT, PASS, STATUS, RH, ADMIN, LUX, AUTO_Q, AUTO_L
  if STATUS == 0:
    Ki_E1_BB_83m_Tra_M_E1_BA_ADt_M_C3_A3()
  else:
    Thay__C4_90_E1_BB_95i_M_E1_BA_ADt_M_C3_A3()
  change_mode()

event_manager.add_timer_event(100, on_event_timer_callback_N_L_a_a_h)

aiot_dht20 = DHT20(SoftI2C(scl=Pin(22), sda=Pin(21)))

def on_event_timer_callback_J_g_P_t_i():
  global th_C3_B4ng_tin, RT, PASS, STATUS, RH, ADMIN, LUX, AUTO_Q, AUTO_L
  aiot_dht20.read_dht20()
  RT = aiot_dht20.dht20_temperature()
  RH = aiot_dht20.dht20_humidity()
  LUX = round(translate((pin2.read_analog()), 0, 4095, 0, 100))
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(0, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(RT)
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(4, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('*C')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(6, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('  ')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(8, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(RH)
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(10, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('%')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(11, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('  ')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(13, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(LUX)
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(15, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('%')
  mqtt.publish('temp', RT)
  if AUTO_Q == 1:
    if RT >= 35:
      pin10.write_analog(round(translate(90, 0, 100, 0, 1023)))
      mqtt.publish('speed', 90)
    else:
      if RT >= 30:
        pin10.write_analog(round(translate(50, 0, 100, 0, 1023)))
        mqtt.publish('speed', 50)
        display.show(Image.HAPPY)
      else:
        pin10.write_analog(round(translate(0, 0, 100, 0, 1023)))
        mqtt.publish('speed', 0)
  mqtt.publish('humidity', RH)
  mqtt.publish('light', LUX)
  if AUTO_L == 1:
    if LUX <= 20:
      mqtt.publish('led1', '#ffffff')
      mqtt.publish('led2', '#ffffff')
      mqtt.publish('led3', '#ffffff')
      mqtt.publish('led4', '#ffffff')
    if LUX >= 80:
      mqtt.publish('led1', '#000000')
      mqtt.publish('led2', '#000000')
      mqtt.publish('led3', '#000000')
      mqtt.publish('led4', '#000000')

event_manager.add_timer_event(60000, on_event_timer_callback_J_g_P_t_i)

    tiny_rgb.show(1, hex_to_rgb('#ffffff'))
